node.excerpt: Episode 2: Satoshi's Place Crispy chats with Adam, the owner of Satoshi's Place, a bitcoin hub located in Bury (near Manchester) in the UK. We cover how and why he started, what the challenges have been and how the future is looking. Twitter links: unspent.space:  https://twitter.com/unspentspace…

Episode 1: Chris's Intro Welcome to the first episode of the unspent.space podcast. In this episode, we delve into the genesis of unspent.space, the origins in Melbourne and discuss how the team was formed. Welcome! Welcome to the unspent.space site. Whether you're trying to start your own space or joining others, this community will help you join the dots. What is unspent.space? unspent.space started out as a cool name to describe the project for creating a permanent space for bitcoiners in Melbourne…
